title: #90: The Needle And The Damage Done
description:
The most important discussion that can be had right now is about the COVID vaccine, but it can’t be had online. A fair and open discussion is off the table on social media due to the crooked relationship between the platforms and Big Pharma.

The media’s role in pushing the vaccine agenda is nothing short of co-conspirators in this whole thing, and they have billions of reasons for doing so, but they have done massive damage to what is left of their disintegrating credibility by pushing fake science.

The vaccine companies would have you believe that you absolutely must “trust the science”, but as Ronald Reagan once said, “trust, but verify”.

Controlled Demolition on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08M21XKJ5
